author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Warmest Greeting from Park Regis Kuta Bali HotelTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Warmest Greeting from Park Regis Kuta Bali Hotel
Bali Island is one of the best destination for couples who just utter a solemn pledge in a marriage sacred. There is no place like Bali to celebrate love. The beautiful of panorama & the uniqueness of Bali Island was the reason for choosing this Island. In that spirit to complete the happiness in this special moment, Park Regis Kuta Hotel announces the “Honeymoon Intimate Package” that has been introduced as romantic indulgence for couples to relives the sweet moment of your honeymoon. We try to give the features unforgettable moments for a once in a lifetime with the ultimate romantic experience of life.
Celebrating your Special Moment at Park Regis Kuta Hotel with only IDR 4.275.000,-net for Honeymoon Intimate Package features return Airport transfer service. Honeymooners will be greeted with a complimentary honeymoon cake, honeymoon set up & fresh rose petals bed arrangement for special decoration in Studio Loft upon arrival or other suite option, Deluxe Pool Suite offers intimate ambience for your beautiful moment (extra cost for Deluxe Pool Suite). Afternoon tea is a part of this package enjoy warm atmosphere in the afternoon. A four-course romantic dinner under the stars and beside of pool with glitter of the moon will ensure that couples is always remembering the love story moment at Park Regis Kuta Bali Hotel “ Intimate Package is provided with selected benefit will present the amazing experience of wonderful honeymoon for honeymooners at Park Regis Kuta Hotel,” says Elok Fitri Hanifah, Director of Sales of Park Regis Kuta Bali hotel.
Source:-Park Regis Kuta Bali Hotel
